ChangeSexActivity.description: {% set speakingNpc = tton_get_speaking_npc_sex_action_info(npc.UUID) %}{{speakingNpc.name}} SWITCHES to different sexual activity during ongoing scene. InviteToYourSex.name: InviteToYourSex
InviteToYourSex.description: {% set speakingNpc = tton_get_speaking_npc_sex_action_info(npc.UUID) %}{{speakingNpc.name}} invites others to join their ongoing sex scene. Use when YOU invite others to YOUR ongoing sex, NOT for refusals. Partners: {{speakingNpc.nearbyPotentialPartners}}

JoinOngoingSex.name: JoinOngoingSex

ChangeSexPace.name: ChangeSexPace
ChangeSexPace.description: {% set speakingNpc = tton_get_speaking_npc_sex_action_info(npc.UUID) %}{{speakingNpc.name}} changes sex pace/intensity. Use when explicitly requesting speed/intensity change, NOT for moans or dirty talk.

StopSex.name: StopSex
StopSex.description: {% set speakingNpc = decnpc(npc.UUID) %}{{speakingNpc.name}} permanently ends sex scene with no intention to continue. Use when explicitly demanding to stop sex entirely and definitively, NOT for breaks, pace adjustments, position changes, dominance play, or dirty talk.
